author: Louis Chilton, Louis Chilton
title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine to write coronavirus plotlines into show 'without it being super tragic'
description: The new season of the hit cop sitcom will deal with 'how [the characters] have been affected by the virus and the pandemic as first responders in New York City'
content:
Popular sitcom Brooklyn Nine-Nine will incorporate the coronavirus pandemic into its storylines, according to the seriess showrunner.
Dan Goor, who co-created the lighthearted cop show, told The Hollywood Reporter: The question is how [the characters] have b… [+1382 chars]
